title: BMW & Mercedes Offer Family Friendly Electric Cars
description:
New electric cars from BMW and Mercedes target the hottest segment of the new car market -- family capable SUVs.

The post BMW & Mercedes Offer Family Friendly Electric Cars appeared first on CleanTechnica.
